  • subMenu

    public void subMenu(int i,
                    java.lang.String choice)
             throws EntryException
    This method create the submenu in function of the needs
  • add the quit and main menu to the options
  • 0- play submenu
  • 1- replay submenu
  • 2- config submenu
  • 3- rules and help submenu
  • and display
Throws:
EntryException
